src:
Galeri Foto
Momen Kuliner Intan Hardja Presenter Cantik yang Heboh Lepas Hijab
01 Nov 2019, 16:00 by instagram intan hardja - detikFood
Jakarta - Intan Hardja sempat beberapa kali membuat heboh. Setelah kasus hubungan intim dengan ABG, Intan kembali membuat heboh dengan aksi lepas hijabnya.


Presenter cantik Intan Hardja kembali membuat heboh. Intan yang sempat berhijab kini kembali menanggalkan hijabnya dan pamer body goals. Foto: instagram intan hardja



Wanita berambut sebahu ini pun menghapus semua fotonya yang mengenakan hijab. Kini instagram Intan jadi serbuan netizen. Foto: instagram intan hardja



Lewat instagramnya, Intan Hardja yang berparas cantik ini kerap kali pamer momen kulineran. Ia tak pernah lupa berpose sebelum menyantap makanan dan minuman enak. Foto: instagram intan hardja



Ngeteh cantik jadi salah satu agenda santai Intan kala waktu senggang. Dengan outfit kuning cerah, Intan siap menyeruput secangkir teh hangat. Foto: instagram intan hardja



Tak sendirian, Intan ngeteh bersama seorang sahabat. Potret candid ini menampilkan wajah Intan yang belum siap difoto tapi tetap tampil cantik. Foto: instagram intan hardja



Teh tampaknya jadi minuman favorit Intan. Dalam banyak momen, ia terlihat santai menikmati secangkir teh. Foto: instagram intan hardja



Kali ini minumannya bukan teh melainkan es kopi. Intan selalu tampil sendiri saat kulineran nih. Ada yang mau menemani? Foto: instagram intan hardja



Salat satu rahasia wajah segarnya ternyata infused water. Intan terlihat duduk santai sambilmenyeruput segelas infused water dengan irisan lemon segar. Foto: instagram intan hardja



Pose ini diambil ketika Intan menunggu penerbangannya di bandara. Segelas kopi hangat menjadi teman Intan agar tak bosan menunggu. Foto: instagram intan hardja



Bersama temannya, Intan terlihat sedang menikmati es kopi susu,macarons dan cinnamon roll. Sore-sore waktu yang tepat untuk bersantai. Foto: instagram intan hardja
text:
Photo Gallery
Culinary Moments Intan Hardja Beautiful Presenter who Splashy off Hijab
Nov 01 2019, 16:00 by instagram diamond hardja - detikFood
Jakarta - Intan Hardja had made a scene several times. After the case of an intimate relationship with ABG, Intan again made a scene with his hijab release action.


The beautiful presenter, Intan Hardja, once again made a scene. Diamond who had hijab has now returned to removing the veil and showing off her body goals. Photo: diamond hardja instagram



This shoulder-length woman even wiped all of her pictures wearing hijab. Now Instagram Intan is a netizens attack. Photo: diamond hardja instagram



Through Instagram, Intan Hardja, who has a beautiful face, often shows off culinary moments. He never forgot to pose before eating delicious food and drinks. Photo: diamond hardja instagram



Getting beautiful is one of Intan's relaxed agendas when she has spare time. With a bright yellow outfit, Intan is ready to sip a cup of warm tea. Photo: diamond hardja instagram



Not alone, Inteh talked with a best friend. This candid portrait shows Intan's face that is not ready to be photographed but still looks beautiful. Photo: diamond hardja instagram



Tea seems to be Intan's favorite drink. In many moments, he looks relaxed enjoying a cup of tea. Photo: diamond hardja instagram



This time the drink was not tea but iced coffee. Diamonds always appear by themselves when they are cooking. Anybody want to accompany? Photo: diamond hardja instagram



One secret prayer of fresh face turned out to be infused water. Intan was seen sitting relaxed while sipping a glass of infused water with fresh lemon slices. Photo: Instagram Hardja Diamond



This pose was taken while Intan waited for her flight at the airport. A glass of warm coffee is Intan's friend so he doesn't get bored waiting. Photo: diamond hardja instagram



Together with his friend, Intan was seen enjoying iced milk coffee, macarons and cinnamon roll. Afternoon is the perfect time to relax. Photo: Instagram Hardja Diamond
